body_html:
Is it possible to do Assign across device boundaries

@lightcatcher, not at this point. All ops on a device are required to have all the input Tensors on that same device.

on very large single training examples (such as a 2 hour video)

You can still use multiple very large tensors, such as around 1GB each.

body:
> >  Is it possible to do Assign across device boundaries

@lightcatcher, not at this point. All ops on a device are required to have all the input Tensors on that same device. 

> > on very large single training examples (such as a 2 hour video) 

You can still use multiple very large tensors, such as around 1GB each.
